full_threads.body:
Hi Keenan,

Sure, we have drafted the colourways.

Hey Joel, Can you remove from the colourways the following colours
  • Lilac
  • Berry
  • Popcorn
  • Thistle
  • Peacock
Warm regards, Keenan Druce Creative Lead T: +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000 acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Sure, confirming we have updated the page.

Looks good! Just one last - can you change the font colour of 'Your Cart' to black



Thanks Joel!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Morning Joel,

Unrelated topic. Can the colourways bar number be changed to be consistent with how many colours we actually have. Currently we have 41 filasorb colours instead of 45, eventually we will have 45 colours but not until the end of the year. Can this also be updated when we combine the filasorb and woodgrain colours well

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead



T: +61 1800 626 462
Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Sure, all good on this one. Please see below:

All done on cart font sizes.
https://acoufelt.com.au/cart/

Regarding milkyway add to cart link, here is a sample link:
http://acoufelt.com.au/cart/?add-to-cart=41446

Hi Joel

Thanks for the quick update!

Please see comments below.

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

I hope all is well.

Sure, please see the details:

With this change in the product data setup, just wondering if it maintains the same flow like before and it didn't affect how orders are pushed into the system?
  • No changes on the flow, its still the same with the flow.

Regarding Add to Cart design - since we removed '12mm color chip (75 x 100mm)', can we add this to Order Sample pop-up? See below mockup
  • Done updating popup details

About the links in the cart, I tried clicking 'Milkyway' but it seems the link is broken. Can we add the link to the solution page instead so they can go back if they want to add more. We can then put the product name in bold then the solution page can appear as a link.
  • We have put a redirect on milkyway and other products.
https://acoufelt.com.au/product/milkyway/ will be redirected to https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/regular-wall-panels/

Also, you would notice in the screenshot below that those on top are those sample orders that I added to my card from the old design and those below are my recently added sample orders from the new page designs, can we use the second thumbnail, so it picks up the sample chip image just like those on top?
  • Cart thumbnail image has been updated.
https://acoufelt.com.au/cart/

Regarding the add to cart url links
Here is an example: 40406, 40297, 41446 are product ids
https://acoufelt.com.au/cart/?add-to-cart=40406,40297,41446&solution=Ovale%203D%20Tiles
https://acoufelt.com.au/cart/?add-to-cart=41446&solution=Ovale%203D%20Tiles

Hi Joel

Sorry forgot to add

I'm also trying to get the add to cart link for specific products. Before I'm appending the variation ID but since we don't have that anymore, we'll just leave that out and will only have the post ID? Below is the link for Milkyway. Let me know if this is correct.

https://acoufelt.com.au/cart/?add-to-cart=41446&quantity=1

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Hi Joel

Thanks for this guide! Appreciate also that you made it easier for us to manage.

With this change in the product data setup, just wondering if it maintains the same flow like before and it didn't affect how orders are pushed into the system?

Regarding Add to Cart design - since we removed '12mm color chip (75 x 100mm)', can we add this to Order Sample pop-up? See below mockup



About the links in the cart, I tried clicking 'Milkyway' but it seems the link is broken. Can we add the link to the solution page instead so they can go back if they want to add more. We can then put the product name in bold then the solution page can appear as a link.

Also, you would notice in the screenshot below that those on top are those sample orders that I added to my card from the old design and those below are my recently added sample orders from the new page designs, can we use the second thumbnail, so it picks up the sample chip image just like those on top?





Let me know if there's anything unclear.

Thanks Joel!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Hi Criselda,

Sure, I did setup the products to be "simple product" instead of variable to make it simpler and easy to manage, If you are on solution page and select an order sample it will grab the solution title and add it to the cart along with the colouways.

https://www.loom.com/share/1f6a36f2a3b9454ab0ed461bb54d3d97?sid=04506c49-d35f-44e9-9ef1-04739bd79e20

Hi Joel


I would like to confirm the product data of our Acoufelt colourways.


I noticed that the products have been reuploaded for the new product page design and seems a bit different to how we set it up previously.


Before, we set the product data as a 'Variable product' (see below Stonewash as an example). But now, the products are tagged as Simple product (see below Milkyway as an example).


Could you provide more info to this change and let us know if we need to switch it back to its previous settings.












Thank you


Warm regards,
Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager
T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com
